name: Anastasiafilatova.github.io
body:
### **Anastasia Filatova** ## Junior Python/Django developer **# About me** I moved to Stockholm almost 3 years ago. Previous I worked as an appraiser at the consulting center in Russia. I also had the opportunity to work as a logistics coordinator in Hyundai dealership.
Both positions included communications with customers as well as a huge responsibility for reporting. Now I spend a lot of time on self-education, learning programming in Python, as well as Django, HTML/CSS and Git. I am a member of PyLadiesStockholm meetup group which helping women learn Python and become a part of Python open-source community. Currently I am looking for new opportunities as a software engineering intern/junior developer. **# My skills** _Languages:_ Russian, English, Swedish _Programming Languages:_ Python, HTML, CSS _Frameworks:_ Django _Software/Systems:_ MS Office, Windows 7/Vista/XP, Mac OS X in user level, basic knowledges in Unix _Version control:_ Git **# Education** * Lobachevsky State University of Nizhny Novgorod. Master's degree, Mathematical methods in economic, 2003 - 2008 * Lobachevsky State University of Nizhny Novgorod. Specialist, Business valuation, 2007 - 2008 **# Courses** I accomplished the online course "Programming in Python for beginners" on www.codecademy.com. Now I am going through the online course "An Introduction to Interactive Programming in Python" on www.coursera.org; the online course "CS253: WEB APPLICATION ENGINEERING" on www.udacity.com. I always learn something new about HTML/CSS on www.w3schools.com. **# Experience** * _Logistics Coordinator at AGAT, official distributor of HYUNDAI, 2010 - 2011_ Worked as an logistics coordinator in a car sales department. Was responsible for guaranteed delivery of cars from the head center HYUNDAI to the local dealership,- maintaining corporate database, payment car invoices, writing car insurance reports etc. * _Appraiser at PCFKO, center of financial consulting and evaluation, 2007 - 2010_ Worked in the team of apprisers. Estimated the values of real properties prior to a final sale. Specialized in commercial and residential property appraisals. Provided an objective, comprehensive and expert opinion about a specific market value of a real property. Performed estimation on basis of market analysis and the comparison objects. Wrote reports about market value of a real property for customers (buyers, sellers, banks etc). _Don't hesitate to contact me if you have any questions!_ My email: anastasia.n.filatova@gmail.com. My tel.: +46723711819
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
